name: いもげばこ　広告消し
description: いもげばこの広告、管理人のコメント等消します
css:

@-moz-document domain("imgbako.com") {

[style="margin-left:330px;"],
[style="border-collapse: collapse;border-color:#0000ff;"],
body > form:nth-child(364),

hr,[href="#toko"],[class^="news_"],
#left_area,#cetner_1,#top_area,[src="http://futalog.com/pgm/ac_chk.php?ip=133.155.206.41&host=bai859bce29.bai.ne.jp"],
#right_area > table:nth-child(10) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(10),
body > table:nth-child(312) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(27) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(22) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(30) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(35) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(23) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(28) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(28) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),
body > table:nth-child(31) > tbody:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2),

{display: none !important;}
